alert.note: Alert for Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 2:07PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Weld County through 245 PM MDT... At 206 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northeast of Rockport, or 15 miles southeast of Cheyenne, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Hereford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare for sudden gusty winds. Secure loose objects and move to a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Larimer County Below 6000 Feet, Northwest Weld County
